turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there, what would you like to do today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order a pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: pizza from bella luna got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, How many pizza would you like to order today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: three medium Hawaiian pizzas with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok let me repeat that for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so thats 3 medium hawaiian pizza with extra cheese is that right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: wonderful, let me get your totals for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: with 3 medium pizza your total is 54 dollars is that your final order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizza are on order at the local Bella Luna pizzeria and will be ready for pickup in 30 min.
